mapper.insert: insert into board_table(boardWriter, boardPass, boardTitle, boardContents, fileAttached) values (#{boardWriter}, #{boardPass}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{fileAttached})
insert into board_file_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, boardId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{id})
mapper.select: select * from board_table order by id desc
mapper.update: update board_table set boardHits = boardHits + 1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from board_table b, board_file_table bf where b.id=bf.boardId and b.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update board_table set boardTitle=#{boardTitle}, boardContents=#{boardContents} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: -- Map으로 넘길 때는 key값을 넘긴다. select * from board_table order by id desc Limit #{start}, #{limit}
-- 컬럼이름 변수 처리할 때 는 $를 쓴다 -- concat - 함수끼리 연결해주는 역할 select * from board_table where ${type} like concat('%', #{q}, '%') order by id desc
